EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Americas_GDT_Sell-More_Pizza-Pie_Email.Internal Send
EmailTemplate.subject: New customers, new growth on GoDirect Trade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you know that 50% of orders placed on GoDirect Trade are new customers for our storefronts? Did you know we’ve processed millions in orders and we’re seeing these numbers increase every day?
E-Commerce is everywhere and it’s only a matter of time before almost all aerospace parts sales are transacted online. For a limited only, we are offering a FREE 6-month seller subscription.
GoDirect Trade takes the hassle out of selling and makes it simple and easy to start selling online. There are no more excuses left to prevent you from selling online:
- Launch a storefront in three easy steps (~5 minutes to complete). Your free 6-month subscription does not require a credit card. - Watch your customer base grow and the orders roll in (ongoing)
GoDirect Trade is an online marketplace and has one of the world’s best selection of used aerospace parts. It has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor.”
Stop doing things the old way and start selling online today. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29kaXJlY3R0cmFkZS5jb20vbWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> #NoExcuses
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
